availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Stuart (Bourbon County, Kentucky, railroad agent)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, railroad agent. Kentucky native. Married to Georgia Williams Stuart. Railroad assistant in Bourbon County, Kentucky, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, Paris Ward 2, p. 441A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Bourbon County, KY, July 1863, p. 25.
"Death of Two Prominent Persons," The Bourbon News (Paris, KY), June 23, 1903, p. 5.
"John Stuart (1837-1903)," Find A Grave, Memorial 89876570, accessed August 25, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/89876570.
